channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tech stocks are nearing their first record high since July as dip-buyers get their wish
item.description: Information technology stocks have shaken off their summertime blues, even reclaiming the top spot on the stock market’s 2024 leaderboard.

item.title: A French crypto whale backing Trump may be moving markets many times that size
item.description: There’s something funny going on in betting markets that seems to be leaking out into banking stocks, the dollar and Treasury yields.

item.title: The FTC is making it easier to cancel subscriptions. You still need to remember one thing.
item.description: People who want to stop paying for a subscription or membership will soon be able to do so with just a call or a click instead of getting caught in a ...

item.title: I’m 63, retired and getting $45,000 per year. But I only have about $200,000 in my IRA and still have a mortgage. What’s my move?
item.description: Have an issue with your financial adviser or considering a new one? Email questions or concerns to picks@marketwatch.com.

item.title: CLOs Are So Hot Right Now, They're Getting ETF'd
item.description: The exchange-traded funds mark the latest effort to bring a hot Wall Street product within reach of ordinary investors.

item.title: TSMC set to produce first chips from new Arizona plant at start of 2025
item.description: TSMC is building three new facilities in Arizona in order to protect its business against mounting tensions between China and the U.S.

item.title: Anticipated ECB Rate Cut Shouldn't Move Short-Dated Bond Yields Much
item.description: Short-end eurozone government bond yields are unlikely to fall meaningfully if the European Central Bank cuts interest rates by 25 basis points in a d...

item.title: Ulta Beauty's New Chapter: Aging Gracefully
item.description: The beauty retailer expects slower growth, but the underlying business still has a lot of appeal.

item.title: Euro Might Have More Scope to Rise Vs Franc Than Dollar After ECB Announcement

item.title: Gold Futures Rise to Near-Record Highs on U.S. Economic Concerns
item.description: Gold futures nudged higher and bulls are gaining strength, in a surge that reflects uncertainty around the U.S. economic outlook, with initial jobless...
